data.label: fail
data.name: humanInputAgentflow
data.description: Request human input, approval or rejection during execution

options.label: Fixed
options.name: fixed
options.description: Specify a fixed description

options.label: Dynamic
options.name: dynamic
options.description: Use LLM to generate a description

inputParams.label: Description
inputParams.name: humanInputDescription
inputParams.placeholder: Are you sure you want to proceed?

inputParams.label: Prompt
inputParams.name: humanInputModelPrompt
inputParams.default:
Summarize the conversation between the user and the assistant, reiterate the last message from the assistant, and ask if user would like to proceed or if they have any feedback.

  • Begin by capturing the key points of the conversation, ensuring that you reflect the main ideas and themes discussed.
  • Then, clearly reproduce the last message sent by the assistant to maintain continuity. Make sure the whole message is reproduced.
  • Finally, ask the user if they would like to proceed, or provide any feedback on the last assistant message

Output Format The output should be structured in three parts in text:

  • A summary of the conversation (1-3 sentences).
  • The last assistant message (exactly as it appeared).
  • Ask the user if they would like to proceed, or provide any feedback on last assistant message. No other explanation and elaboration is needed.

inputParams.default:
Summarize the conversation between the user and the assistant, reiterate the last message from the assistant, and ask if user would like to proceed or if they have any feedback.

  • Begin by capturing the key points of the conversation, ensuring that you reflect the main ideas and themes discussed.
  • Then, clearly reproduce the last message sent by the assistant to maintain continuity. Make sure the whole message is reproduced.
  • Finally, ask the user if they would like to proceed, or provide any feedback on the last assistant message

Output Format The output should be structured in three parts in text:

  • A summary of the conversation (1-3 sentences).
  • The last assistant message (exactly as it appeared).
  • Ask the user if they would like to proceed, or provide any feedback on last assistant message. No other explanation and elaboration is needed.

inputParams.label: Enable Memory

options.label: All Messages
options.name: allMessages
options.description: Retrieve all messages from the conversation

options.label: Window Size
options.name: windowSize
options.description: Uses a fixed window size to surface the last N messages

options.label: Conversation Summary
options.name: conversationSummary
options.description: Summarizes the whole conversation

options.label: Conversation Summary Buffer
options.name: conversationSummaryBuffer
options.description: Summarize conversations once token limit is reached. Default to 2000

inputParams.description: Uses a fixed window size to surface the last N messages

inputParams.description: Summarize conversations once token limit is reached. Default to 2000
